Gallatin School of Individual Study Bulletin
Gallatin School of Individual Study Bulletin

This page houses the Bulletin for New York University's Gallatin School of Individualized Study, with information about the structure and goals of individualized study programs, degree requirements, the IAPC essay, and the colloquium requirement for undergraduate students, as well as course offerings, study abroad opportunities, admissions, and financial aid resources. The page also details core courses and independent study components for individualized Master of Arts programs through Gallatin, and lists student resources and faculty profiles.
